columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the blob.

columns.name: storage_account_name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the storage account, in which the blob is located.

columns.name: container_name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the container, in which the blob has been uploaded.

columns.name: type
columns.description: Specifies the type of the blob.

columns.name: is_snapshot
columns.description: Specifies whether the resource is snapshot of a blob, or not.

columns.name: access_tier
columns.description: The tier of the blob.

columns.name: creation_time
columns.description: Indicates the time, when the blob was uploaded.

columns.name: deleted
columns.description: Specifies whether the blob was deleted, or not.

columns.name: deleted_time
columns.description: Specifies the deletion time of blob container.

columns.name: etag
columns.description: An unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

columns.name: last_modified
columns.description: Specifies the date and time the container was last modified.

columns.name: snapshot
columns.description: Specifies the time, when the snapshot is taken.

columns.name: version_id
columns.description: Specifies the version id.

columns.name: server_encrypted
columns.description: Indicates whether the blob is encrypted on the server, or not.

columns.name: encryption_scope
columns.description: The name of the encryption scope under which the blob is encrypted.

columns.name: encryption_key_sha256
columns.description: The SHA-256 hash of the provided encryption key.

columns.name: is_current_version
columns.description: Specifies whether the blob container was deleted, or not.

columns.name: access_tier_change_time
columns.description: Species the time, when the access tier has been updated.

columns.name: access_tier_inferred
columns.description: Indicates whether the access tier was inferred by the service.

columns.name: blob_sequence_number
columns.description: Specifies the sequence number for page blob used for coordinating concurrent writes.

columns.name: content_length
columns.description: Specifies the size of the content returned.

columns.name: cache_control
columns.description: Indicates the cache control specified for the blob.

columns.name: content_disposition
columns.description: Specifies additional information about how to process the response payload, and also can be used to attach additional metadata.

columns.name: content_encoding
columns.description: Indicates content encoding specified for the blob.

columns.name: content_language
columns.description: Indicates content language specified for the blob.

columns.name: content_md5
columns.description: If the content_md5 has been set for the blob, this response header is stored so that the client can check for message content integrity.

columns.name: content_type
columns.description: Specifies the content type specified for the blob. If no content type was specified, the default content type is application/octet-stream.

columns.name: copy_completion_time
columns.description: Conclusion time of the last attempted Copy Blob operation where this blob was the destination blob.

columns.name: copy_id
columns.description: A String identifier for the last attempted Copy Blob operation where this blob was the destination blob.

columns.name: copy_progress
columns.description: Contains the number of bytes copied and the total bytes in the source in the last attempted Copy Blob operation where this blob was the destination blob.

columns.name: copy_source
columns.description: An URL up to 2 KB in length that specifies the source blob used in the last attempted Copy Blob operation where this blob was the destination blob.

columns.name: copy_status
columns.description: Specifies the state of the copy operation identified by Copy ID.

columns.name: copy_status_description
columns.description: Describes cause of fatal or non-fatal copy operation failure.

columns.name: destination_snapshot
columns.description: Included if the blob is incremental copy blob or incremental copy snapshot, if x-ms-copy-status is success. Snapshot time of the last successful incremental copy snapshot for this blob.

columns.name: lease_duration
columns.description: Specifies whether the lease is of infinite or fixed duration, when a blob is leased.

columns.name: lease_state
columns.description: Specifies lease state of the blob.

columns.name: lease_status
columns.description: Specifies the lease status of the blob.

columns.name: incremental_copy
columns.description: Copies the snapshot of the source page blob to a destination page blob. The snapshot is copied such that only the differential changes between the previously copied snapshot are transferred to the destination.

columns.name: is_sealed
columns.description: Indicate if the append blob is sealed or not.

columns.name: remaining_retention_days
columns.description: The number of days that the blob will be retained before being permanently deleted by the service.

columns.name: archive_status
columns.description: Specifies the archive status of the blob.

columns.name: blob_tag_set
columns.description: A list of blob tags.

columns.name: metadata
columns.description: A name-value pair to associate with the container as metadata.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
